recipes.title: Classic Pasta Carbonara
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook pasta according to package instructions
2. Fry pancetta and garlic in olive oil until crispy
3. Whisk eggs and grated parmesan
4. Combine hot pasta with egg mixture and pancetta
5. Season with black pepper

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.instructions:
1. Chop all vegetables
2. Heat oils in wok
3. Stir-fry garlic and ginger
4. Add vegetables in order of cooking time
5. Season with soy sauce

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.instructions:
1. Chop vegetables into chunks
2. Combine in bowl
3. Top with feta and olives
4. Dress with olive oil
5. Season with oregano and salt

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.instructions:
1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices
2. Grill chicken until charred
3. Make sauce with tomatoes and cream
4. Combine chicken and sauce
5. Simmer until thick

recipes.title: Quinoa Buddha Bowl
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook quinoa
2. Roast sweet potato and chickpeas
3. Massage kale with olive oil
4. Make tahini dressing
5. Assemble bowl with all ingredients

recipes.title: Classic French Omelette
recipes.instructions:
1. Whisk eggs until smooth
2. Melt butter in non-stick pan
3. Pour eggs and stir constantly
4. Add chives when almost set
5. Fold and serve

recipes.title: Guacamole
recipes.instructions:
1. Mash avocados
2. Dice tomato, onion, and jalapeno
3. Chop cilantro
4. Combine all ingredients
5. Season with lime juice and salt

recipes.title: Sushi Roll
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook and season rice
2. Prepare vegetables
3. Place nori on bamboo mat
4. Spread rice and add fillings
5. Roll and slice
